key.name: Key
key.value: Specify the key column for the operation. To specify more than one key, use a comma or Enter.

orderBy.name: Order By
orderBy.value1: You can specify the order of output columns:
orderBy.value3: 2. In the drop-down lists that appear, specify the sort order (Asc or Desc) and column name.
orderBy.value5: 1. Use the Plus button to add as many columns as you need.
orderBy.value6: 2. Use the Minus button to remove the filter.
orderBy.value7: 3. When multiple columns are used in ORDER BY, first the rows will be sorted based on the first
orderBy.value8: column and then by the second column. Use the Upp Arrow and Down Arrow to change the order of columns.
